title: Claude Code Rate Limit
interrupted: was interrupted due to usage limits.

swap.proactiveDescription: Automatically switched from {from} to {to} before hitting rate limit.
swap.reactiveDescription: Rate limit hit on {from}. Automatically switched to {to} and restarted.
swap.operationStopped: The operation was stopped because {profile} reached its usage limit.
swap.switchBelow: Switch to another account below to continue.
swap.addAccount: Add another Claude account to continue working.

upgrade.button: Upgrade to Pro for Higher Limits
upgrade.title: Upgrade for more usage
upgrade.description: Upgrade your Claude subscription for higher usage limits.

reset.title: Resets {time}
reset.weekly: Weekly limit - resets in about a week
reset.session: Session limit - resets in a few hours

switching.title: Switch Account & Retry
switching.switchTo: Switch to another Claude account and retry the operation:
switching.addAnother: Add another Claude subscription to automatically switch when you hit rate limits.
switching.loginPrompt: This will open Claude login to authenticate the new account.

info.title: What happened:
info.description: The {source} operation was stopped because your Claude account ({profile}) reached its usage limit.
info.switchOrAdd: You can switch to another account and retry, or add more accounts above.
info.addOrWait: Add another Claude account above to continue working, or wait for the limit to reset.

alert.title: A terminal has been opened to authenticate "{name}".
alert.step1: 1. Check the "Agent Terminals" section in the sidebar
alert.step2: 2. Complete the OAuth login in your browser
alert.step3: 3. The token will be saved automatically
alert.return: Once done, return here and the account will be available.
alert.failed: Failed to start authentication: {error} Please try again.
alert.addFailed: Failed to add profile. Please try again.
